item.description:
WE ARE AT THE PHOENIX (512 Mass Ave.) BY 7 PM. THEN WE REGROUP AT RODNEY'S (698 Mass Ave.) -- that's 3 blocks away-- at 7:30.

INTRODUCE YOURSELVES & ask others if they are with the meetup! Try & stick with the group & keep to the schedule!

This is co-posted Social Fun & Boston Social and Cultural Fun.

The Phoenix
http://phoenixlandingbar.com/happy.html

Phoenix has half off apps. but you have to order before 7 PM. Their back round music is a marvel. WE LEAVE THE PHOENIX AT ABOUT 7:20!

We go to regroup at Rodney's at 7:30
http://www.rodneysbookstore.com/
is like a museum except you can buy or not buy stuff there at very affordable prices.

l am not promoting a business (I'm a volunteer). But Rodney's in Central Square Cambridge is blossoming. On Fridays it also has great back round music. Here is your orientation link.
Rodney's closes at 9 PM.

Rodney's now also has knick-knacks-- unique stocking-stuffers, vintage print-on-demand posters, & half price 2013 calendars. (This is not a promotion it is an observation).

I noticed books such as: "Jane Austin's Guide to Dating." "Breeding Anthuriniums in Hawaii". "River Monsters". "Whippets Today". "Dog Sense". Great venue for a meetup, & the music is perfect.

Perfect Meetup atmosphere. It is a Mix & Mingle!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet at the tall tables by the bar closer to the back area.
item.name: Rodney's Books & Stocking Stuffers, & Phoenix Landing Pub w/ Half-price Apps.
